name: naturah-shopify-theme
description: A custom Shopify theme for Naturah watercolor kits

scripts.build: npm run tailwind:build && npm run minify
scripts.minify:css: postcss assets/tailwind.css --use cssnano -o assets/tailwind.min.css --no-map && postcss assets/theme-main.css --use cssnano -o assets/theme-main.min.css --no-map
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js

author: Naturah
